Natalia Torres wrote:
>
> Hello
> I'm using credential to crawl my site with Basic Auth, using
> org.archive.crawler.datamodel.credential.Rfc2617Credential.
>
> Activating this submodule, new settings appears:
>
> credential-domain: name.myweb.com
> realm: Basic
> Login and Password
>
> I try with all robots policy.
> I need add/change any other value?? or property?
>












Hello Natalie:

It can be tricky getting Auth to work.  I'd suggest you enable the extra 
logging suggested in the user manual under section 6.2.3 Credentials.  
It'll give you extra info on the Auth challenge/response exchange.  This 
in combination with study of the Heritrix crawl.log will hopefully give 
you insight as to why the login is not working.

Yours,
St.Ack











>
> Thanks
>
>
